subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Billy Hamilton of the Pensacola Blue Wahoos is nearing the record for steals in a minor league season with 143. The record is 145, set by Vince Coleman, a former Cardinals and Mets outfielder.
snippet: Billy Hamilton of the Pensacola Blue Wahoos is nearing the record for steals in a minor league season with 143. The record is 145, set by Vince Coleman, a former Cardinals and Mets outfielder.
